page.title: 04Fish,Chips and Peas!Please!
page.content: One of the most popular meals in 1985 is easily{fish,chips and peas.} You can make the meal yourself but most people prefer to buy it from the{ {fish and chip shop. { } The fish is usually white fish, normally {cod.}It is fried in deep fat in a batter mix and comes out golden brown. The{chips}are long thin slices of potato which are also deep fried. The{peas}are ordinary peas boiled up. If you go to the{fish and chip shop} for this meal they will wrap it up in newspaper for you.The meal now costs anything from Â£1 to Â£1.25. To eat your{fish and chips}you will also need{salt and vinegar}which is supplied free and is added according to your own taste but the meal would not be the same without them.
